title: New Wash Original Hair Cleanser, 8oz - Natural & Cruelty-Free Hair Care Routine - Removes Oil, Protects Color, Reduces Frizz - Sulfate & Paraben-Free Shampoo & Conditioner Alternative

features: SHAMPOO IS THE PROBLEM, NEW WASH IS THE SOLUTION: New Wash hair cleanser is a life-changing salon-quality alternative to shampoo & conditioner. Our revolutionary formula was engineered to remove excess dirt & rejuvenate roots and ends.

SOFTER, SHINIER HAIR & HEALTHIER SCALP: Experience softer, shinier, healthier hair by eliminating the need to use expensive detanglers, masques & deep conditioner products. Get rid of frustrating dryness & slow down your scalp from over-producing oil.

ELIMINATE FRIZZ & KEEP YOUR COLOR: New Wash doesn't include ingredients like sulfate and detergent making it perfect for natural curls & colored hair. See your curls take shape & frizz phased out. New Wash is a color protectant and will keep your hair vibrant without constant dyeing & processing.

NON-TOXIC INGREDIENTS NEVER TESTED ON ANIMALS: Our cruelty-free formula includes a combination of natural essential oils and naturally-derived saturated cleansers. All products are biodegradable & free of synthetic fragrances.

SAVE MONEY, STOP BUYING EXPENSIVE NAME BRANDS: You’re wasting hundreds of dollars on professional brand name products that damage your hair. New Wash gives you soft, cooperative, silky smooth and consistent texture without breaking the bank.
description: Product description NEW WASH ORIGINAL It's not a shampoo. It’s a cleansing cream. And your healthiest hair starts here. New Wash products enhance your natural texture, preserves color and avoid damage caused by traditional shampoos. Ideal for straight, wavy, curly or coily hair types. Our clarifying and conditioning cleanser is suitable for both women and men. BENEFITS: CLEANSE AND CONDITION Gently removes dirt, oil and buildup while adding moisture, simplifying your wash day routine BALANCE Rebalances natural oil production to improve hair and scalp health ENHANCE Promotes a shiny and soft texture, preventing tangles and frizz NOURISH Avoids damage caused by shampoo detergents with a clean formula PROTECT Helps hair color last longer and keeps natural color vibrant HOW TO USE: Wet hair and dispense a generous amount of New Wash, about the combined amount of shampoo and conditioner you typically use. Layer it on from scalp to ends, then add a bit of water to get a smooth, milky consistency. Work New Wash into hair and scalp, using our Massaging Scalp Brush to coat every inch—scrub, massage, repeat. Let it sit for 2-3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly. Use the scalp brush to ensure all product is washed out. ABOUT HAIRSTORY Hairstory was born from a fundamental belief: the world needs fewer, better things. We develop clean formulas that promote total hair and scalp wellness.That’s healthy haircare, without compromise. Promise. Ingredients Water, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Stearyl Alcohol, Gluconolactone, Distearoylethyl Dimonium Chloride, Rosa Centifolia Flower Water, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Panthenol, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Leaf Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Keratin, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Menthyl Lactate, Ceteareth-20, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Calcium Gluconate, Phenoxyethanol, Tocopherol, Alcohol Fragrance: Myroxylon Pereirae (Balsam Peru) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Aniba Rosaeodora (Rosewood) Wood Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Leaf Oil, Cananga Odorata (Ylang Ylang) Flower Oil, Jasminum Officinale Oil, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Cinnamate, Citronellol, Geraniol, Linalool Directions Apply to wet hair, massage into scalp, and rinse out. Safety Warning For external use only See more
